abortDistributionEvent(string).details: Aborts an ongoing distributionEvent and revokes all batch commitments.

params._distributionEvent: string Name of a new distribution event

announceDistributionEvent(string,bytes32.details: Declares a new distribution event. Verifies a distribution event with the same name is not already ongoing, and records commitments for all reward payments in the form of batch hashes array to state.

params._batchHashes: bytes32[] The address of the OrbsValidators contract.
params._distributionEvent: string Name of a new distribution event

distributeRewards(string,address[],uint2.details: Bypasses announcement/commitment process flow for batch payments. Requires owner privileges to execute. Provided as a mechanism for alternative batch commitment mechanisms if needed in the future.

params._amounts: uint256[] a list of amounts to transfer each recipient at the corresponding array index
params._distributionEvent: string Name of a new distribution event
params._recipients: address[] a list of recipients addresses

drainOrbs().details: For disaster recovery purposes. Transfers away any Orbs balance from this contract to the owners address

executeCommittedBatch(string,address[],u.details: Accepts a batch of payments associated with a distributionEvent. Once validated against the batch hash commitment, the batch is cleared from commitment array and executed. If this was the last batch in distributionEvent, the record is cleared and distributionEvent is logged as completed.

params._amounts: uint256[] a list of amounts to transfer each recipient at the corresponding array index
params._batchIndex: uint256 index of the specified batch in commitments array
params._distributionEvent: string Name of a new distribution event
params._recipients: address[] a list of recipients addresses

getPendingBatches(string).details: Returns all pending (not yet executed) batch hashes and indices associated with a distributionEvent

params._distributionEvent: string Name of a new distribution event

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

reassignRewardsDistributor(address).details: Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newRewardsDistributor: The address to set as the new rewards-distributor.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

isRewardsDistributor().notice: return true if `msg.sender` is the assigned rewards-distributor.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
